title: Memory error in recalling assailant appearance

content.question: A few people witness an assault. Before the police arrive, one witness confidently tells the others that the assailant was wearing a green shirt, though in fact the shirt was blue. Later, when the police interview each witness individually, almost all of them state that they remember a green shirt. The memory error is referred to as

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
